Definition.WordDefinition: Joplin, MO (city, FIPS 37592) Location: 37.08180 N, 94.50297 W Population (1990): 40961 (19367 housing units) Area: 76.9 sq km (land), 0.2 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 64801, 64804 Joplin, MT Zip code(s): 59531

Joplin n 1: United States singer who died of a drug overdose at the height of her popularity (1943-1970) [syn: {Janis Joplin}] 2: United States composer who was the first creator of ragtime to write down his compositions (1868-1917) [syn: {Scott Joplin}]
